product_name: Kershaw Cryo II BlackWash Pocket Knife
long_description: The popular Kershaw Cryo II Knife now has a BlackWash finish to give it an already-broken-in look like your favorite pair of well-worn jeans while adding an extra measure of protection to the metal.
short_description: The popular Kershaw Cryo II Knife now has a BlackWash finish to give it an already-broken-in look like your favorite pair of well-worn jeans while adding an extra measure of protection to the metal.
